parsermigration-edit-subtitle: A subtitle shown below the h1 when editing a page with the tool
parsermigration-current:
Adjective. The column heading for the article HTML as shown by the current parser.
{{Identical|Current}}
parsermigration-new:
The column heading for the article HTML as shown by the "new" parser
{{Identical|New}}
parsermigration-pref-label: The user preference label for a checkbox which enables the feature
parsermigration-pref-help: Help text for the user preference checkbox
parsermigration-toolbox-label: The text of the toolbox link, which allows the user to edit the page with a special user interface.
parsermigration-parsoid-readviews-select: The user preference label for drop-down selector which allows opt-in, opt-out, or the use of the wiki default setting for the use of the new Parsoid parser
Help text for the user preference drop-down selector for the use of the new Parsoid parser
parsermigration-parsoid-readviews-always: Selector text used when the user wants to always use the new Parsoid parser to render wikitext
parsermigration-parsoid-readviews-defaul: Selector text used when the user wants to follow the wiki default preferences for the use of the Parsoid parser to render wikitext
parsermigration-parsoid-readviews-never: Selector text used when the user wants to never use the new Parsoid parser to render wikitext
parsermigration-use-legacy-parser-toolbo: The text of the toolbox link which allows the user to use the legacy parser to render this page
parsermigration-use-parsoid-toolbox-labe: The text of the toolbox link which allows the user to use the Parsoid parser to render this page
parsermigration-notice-title: Title text for a notification displayed when a user views a page rendered with the Parsoid wikitext parser for the first time.
parsermigration-notice-body: Body text for a notification displayed when a user views a page rendered with the Parsoid wikitext parser for the first time.
parsermigration-parsoid-chip-label: Short text for an indicator at the top of an article page marking a page that has been rendered with the new Parsoid wikitext parser.
